name: Watermelon Pico De Gallo
keywords: appetizer, honeydew, jalapeño, seedless watermelon, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups seeded watermelon, cut into 1/4-inch dice
1/4 cup honeydew melon, cut into 1/4-inch dice
1/4 cup red onion, cut into 1/4-inch dice
1/2 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a medium bowl and toss gently until well combined. Serve immediately.
